entry.title: No Big Deal
entry.summary:
Author: Emgiehae

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,694Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Celebrations like this one always bring up bittersweet memories for Buck.When his family start reminiscing about their Academy Graduation, Buck is brought back to a time where no one was there for him.But it's fine!It's not big deal.Really, it isn't.Buck used to be lonely, and he isn't any more.Or: After Harry's graduation, they all head to Buck's for an after-party. Memories are brought up, secrets are revealed, and Buck doesn't feel alone anymore.

entry.title: How Far Do I Have to Fall?
entry.summary:
Author: shadowkatninjawarrior

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,784Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 95

Summary: A week into the lawsuit, Buck realises what a mistake he's making. But when he tries to back out, Mackey responds with blackmail. Confronted with evidence of the years Buck spent as a sex worker to survive, Buck takes it to the police. One hush hush sting operation later, Buck can head back to work. Everything will be fine.It won't matter that no one knows about the blackmail... Right?Or,More lawsuit angst, because I simply can't help myself.

"What?"Buck takes the exit that the GPS tells him to. He can see the motel down the road."I can't be your first. I just can't. It would‚Äî" Buck shakes his head, "I'm sorry, Eddie. I can't be the first queer person you date."Eddie's brows are furrowed, the way they get when he's tittering between angry and confused. entry.title: Last chances and second glances
entry.summary:
Author: thebookofcrows

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 147,203Chapters: 43/60Kudos: 826

Summary: St. Anthony‚Äôs was his last chance, and Evan knew that. He had been kicked out of five schools in the past six years, and after his sophomore year ended with a meeting between his parents and his last headmaster that could be summarized with: ‚Äúwe‚Äôre not kicking him out, but just know that Evan is not welcome back in September.‚Äù His parents wanted to send him to military school. ¬† ¬† ¬† Evan knew he couldn‚Äôt survive military school, that would be his last drop, the one that finally shattered the vase. He couldn‚Äôt be the type of person that would be able to put himself back together once they broke him down. ¬† ¬† This had to work. . . . Buck is the new kid in an El Paso boarding school, trying his best to stay out of trouble. Eddie is a rockstar (in the world of high school popularity) he's captain to the football team, he's dating the most popular girl in school, and looking at a full ride sports scholarship in the fall. He should feel like he won at life, which is why he doesn't understand why the only time he feels alive is when he catches a glimpse of the new guy on the running team. Or in simpler terms: Buddie high-school AU!

entry.title: i can't save us
entry.summary:
Author: purexheart

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,280Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 58

Summary: Her parents had forced her to keep her life before Hershey a secret from her new friends. She couldn‚Äôt talk about Daniel or the day he died. And she couldn‚Äôt talk about the week after when her parents ripped Evan out of her life as well. At fifteen, Maddie started to form a plan to get out of town and try everything she can to track her brother down. At eighteen, she took off while her parents slept in a bed upstairs with no idea where to begin, just knowing she had to try. Or; The Buckley‚Äôs couldn‚Äôt stand being reminded of Daniel every time they stare back into Evan‚Äôs eyes. They put him up for adoption, move towns, and try to start again no matter how much pain that put their daughter through.

entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 696,077Chapters: 73/?Kudos: 98

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who‚Äôve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 474,650Chapters: 66/?Kudos: 27

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn‚Äôt end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they‚Äôre reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 285,243Chapters: 48/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn‚Äôt be more different. She‚Äôs the disciplined ‚Äúgood girl‚Äù with her future mapped out, while he‚Äôs the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Drowning (in the loneliness)
entry.summary:
Author: Dolly_mae_17

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,419Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 106

Summary: The damn lawsuit If he could, he‚Äôd never in a million universes file that lawsuit. The lawsuit didn‚Äôt solve anything, actually it made things worse. He lost everybody. Even Maddie because she chose Chimney over him. Of course she would. Who in their right mind would choose him? No one. No one ever has. All he wanted was his family back. Why couldn't they see that? Now all he has is an empty apartment. An apartment that used to float with joy, laughter, love. Thinking of those memories actually put a smile on his face after the day he just had. They won't ever be like that again, because he ruined it just like he ruins everything. Why couldn‚Äôt he just wait it out? Just wait for Bobby to say he can come back? Instead he chose to sue the department, and Bobby.

entry.title: Indigo
entry.summary:
Author: MultiFandomBL23

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,202Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 338

Summary: Even when most people could say that Evan "Buck" Buckley won and could finally get back to work at the 118...it all tasted to bittersweet.Turns out that maybe he lost exactly the things he was figthing for and aparently it didn¬¥t matter how much he tried to apologize...nobody was willing to listen and day after day with every glare, harsh word trown his way and the absolute silence from the people he once considered his family, to not even mention how things were between Eddie and him-it all became to much for his heart and mind to handle-hence Buck¬¥s breaking point.Now the universe was actually pissed off things may need to take a turn for better or for worse depending on who you ask. Cause for anyone to learn the right lesson...things need to happend.Or...Buck gives up and decides that enough is enough and because the universe actually listens (and it feels like Buck deserves a break) it is time for everyone else to learn a lesson or two by any means necessary, even if near death experiences, people actually using their words, amnesia, ghost from the past (metaphorical and literal) are needed.Cause sometimes love needs help to make everything better.

That‚Ä¶hasn‚Äôt gone away.‚Äù ‚ÄúOh.‚Äù Eddie blinks, then, ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù Because he could‚Äôve sworn‚Ä¶but looking back on it, there's no reason to think that it went away. No reason except‚Ä¶for the hours he has dedicated to making Eddie's son teach him math. (or, the inherent romance of realizing how much the love of your life cares about your son's math homework)

entry.title: Buck and L.A. Diazes
entry.summary:
Author: Angelsofhope

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,258Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 54

Summary: Evan Buckley was learning that no matter how hard you try, you cannot force things. Still off work recovering, even though he's passed his rectification, he is at a loss about how to get back to work. He decides to go to the pier hoping that seeing the children having fun, will lift his heavy spirit Eddie Diaz is learning that he should have been honest with his closest friend that he had left, instead of getting an angry face emoji with a hand covering mouth emoji along with a picture of his son meeting said friend in person for the first time instead of over face-time just as he's about to enter the office for his therapist that his aunt bullied him to see.
